name: Knight
description: A knight formed of folded cards offers a sword also made from cards. The Knight card signifies trust and loyalty.

person: A trustworthy person who _honors their commitments.
A person who can't be trusted, or a traitor posing as a loyal friend.
creatureTrap: A creature bound by oaths or who serves someone else.
A knight who has failed to live up to their code of honor (such as a death knight).
place: A place of sanctuary, where strong traditions protect those who take shelter inside.
A place where a great betrayal took place, or a location with treacherous terrain or traps.
treasure: A treasure celebrating or commemorating an oath (such as a wedding ring), or magic weapons or armor associated with knights or paladins.
A treasure that carries a hidden curse, or a magic item that fails when it's needed most.
situation: A situation that requires loyalty in one's companions and faithfulness to them.
A situation involving the betrayal of trust, or rampant suspicion.
